@all
so its requests time..
u can request from 25th to 27th..
i will only choose 15 movies of the requests and will reveal the list of chosen movies on 28th..will start working on them from 15th dec as i hv some more pending requests to complete...

the selection procedure will be like this:
-i will nt choose movie which i hv seen.
-more the imdb rating more the preference.
-dont request movies too old like from 60's,70's,80's.
-there will be preference to genre as well
a)action/comedy/romance/thriller/sc-fi/musical
b)adventure/drama/animation
c)war/crime
no horror...
-1st preference will be given to english language movies 2nd preference to hindi.
-my selection will nt be based on fulfilling everyone's request bt on choosing good movies.

-Lastly plz provide the imdb link along with movie name...no need to provide source link i'll search that myself...

and sorry to all beforehand...because i know i will nt be able to accept all ur requests...i hv my limitations..i hope u will understand..
